          <title>
            <string language="en">House insulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hausisolierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Isolation de Chambre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isolação da casa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Isolamento della Camera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόνωση σπιτιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aislante de la casa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show wall insulation techniques using air (top) and other solid insulators (bottom) to fill gaps between inner and outer walls.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insulator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cavity walls</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection currents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">house insulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen Wandisolierung Techniken 
mit Luft (Oberseite) und anderen festen Isolierungen (Unterseite) zu 
den Fülleabständen zwischen den inneren und äußeren Wänden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent des techniques 
d'isolation de mur en utilisant l'air (dessus) et d'autres isolateurs 
pleins (bas) aux lacunes de remplissage entre les murs intérieurs et 
externes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram técnicas da 
isolação da parede usando o ar (alto) e outros isoladores contínuos
(fundo) às aberturas da suficiência entre paredes internas e 
exteriores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano le tecniche 
dell'isolamento della parete usando l'aria (parte superiore) ed altri 
isolanti solidi (parte inferiore) alle lacune del materiale di 
riempimento fra le pareti interne ed esterne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν τεχνικές μόνωσης 
τοίχων χρησιμοποιώντας τον αέρα (κορυφή) και άλλους στερεούς 
μονωτές (κατώτατο σημείο) για να καλύψουν τα κενά μεταξύ των 
εσωτερικών και εξωτερικών τοίχων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran técnicas del 
aislante de la pared usando el aire (tapa) y otros aisladores sólidos
(fondo) a los boquetes del terraplén entre las paredes internas y 
externas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isolierung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
